text: Judgment of the Mad () is a 1961 Soviet drama movie directed by Grigori Roshal.Дездемона из массовкиСУД СУМАСШЕДШИХ It stars Vasily Livanov, Irina Skobtseva, and Viktor Khokhryakov. == Actors == * Vasily Livanov - Johannes Werner * Irina Skobtseva - Susie Harrer * Viktor Khokhryakov - Siegfried Gruber * Olga Krasina - Clare == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1961 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Grigori Roshal
title: Judgment of the Mad
